title: Reporting people doesnt help...
body: I cannot believe the amount of immature people and people who just love ruining peoples games for their own fun, out of 20 games i swear 15 of them have people who just troll and feed, flame people, afk, leaver and etc that makes it to a lost. i dont even talk, i try to suggest in a nicely manner ways to come back and say ''we can still win '' and i do average or quite good but these people just ruin the game, it makes me wanna quit im sure many people do, many of my friends has due to this, im S4 and cannot get out of it...

replies.body: If you want to climb out of silver and escape the toxic players, you need to stop worry about winning or any other players. Start the game off with the /mute all command and only focus on your own gameplay. Don't try to talk to people to keep them positive, don't worry about anyone else.  When you improve enough you will be able to carry yourself out of silver despite all the toxic players.
BTW reporting does do something. my whole team reported this riven for going duo top since she was last pick and I received a message saying she got punished.

i logged into my NA smurf which is lvl 6 yesterday. i got a msg telling me i was chat restricted for 20 games LOL. i play on that account like 1-2 games every 2 months or more. now that i think about it i remember that i was talking a bit of shit last time i played (in may) lol. just shows you how bad the system is here. nobody gets chat restricted let alone banned, especially after just 1 game.
